-#ifndef SHARE_GC_SHARED_GENCOLLECTEDHEAP_HPP
-#define SHARE_GC_SHARED_GENCOLLECTEDHEAP_HPP
-
-#include "memory/allStatic.hpp"
-
-class Generation;
-
-// Reserve this for 'space.cpp'
-class GenCollectedHeap : AllStatic {
-public:
-  static Generation* young_gen();
-};

@@ -29,1 +29,0 @@

@@ -47,0 +46,1 @@

@@ -129,1 +129,4 @@

+#if INCLUDE_SERIALGC
+      cp->gen = SerialHeap::heap()->young_gen();
+#endif // INCLUDE_SERIALGC
+
